setting.name: rqc_journal_id
setting.description: The journal ID as generated by RQC (you may need to ask your publisher to create one at reviewqualitycollector.org or use RQC's Demo mode to try it out all by yourself)

setting.name: rqc_journal_api_key
setting.description: The journal API key as generated by RQC. Ask your publisher to tell you yours or use RQC's Demo mode and create one yourself.
